thread.title: Chicago family killed by driver going over 100mph | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Chicago family killed by driver going over 100mph | Daily Mail Online

author: Regina F. Graham For Dailymail.Com
title: Chicago family killed by driver going over 100mph | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Mercedes driver, 21, who killed parents of three and their eldest daughter in horrific 100mph crash had his license suspended FOUR TIMES prior Kevin Crawford, 52, his wife, Anita Crawford, 50 and their oldest daughter, Kirsten Crawford, 20, all died in fatal crash Thursday night Police say the driver who was at fault in the crash, Piotr Rog, 21, also died following the accident, as he was driving over 60mph over the 40mph limit A passenger in Rog's Mercedes survived the accident, but is in critical condition Rog had his license suspended four times and just had it reinstated less than a month ago after a three month suspension A GoFundMe page created is asking for donations to provide financial support for the couple's two children they left behind, Hailee, 15, and Christian, 9 Published: 17:56 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 18:58 GMT, 21 February 2017 8 shares
